name: Academys Undercover Professor
author: sayren
content: Machiavelli and Gerrard are just one of the many names the new professor of Ceoren Academy uses to disguise his identity - and now he can add one more to his list, Professor Ludger Cherish. The real Ludger Cherish dies on board a train during a terrorist attack, making him the perfect target for a new identity. Little does the new professor know, Ludger Cherish was involved in something deep and secret. The new Professor Ludger has to be careful to not get caught by the school and the dangerous
